com.googlecode.prmf.merapi.net.irc.event
Class AbstractIrcEventListener

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.prmf.merapi.net.irc.event.AbstractIrcEventListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, IrcEventListener
public abstract class AbstractIrcEventListener
extends Object
implements IrcEventListener

Basic implementation of the IrcEventListener interface providing empty implementations for all the methods.

Author:
Miorel-Lucian Palii
